games.title: Counter-Strike
games.description: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive (CS:GO) is a 2012 multiplayer tactical first-person shooter developed by Valve.

games.title: Apex
games.description: Apex Legends is a free-to-play hero shooter game where legendary competitors battle for glory, fame, and fortune on the fringes of the Frontier

games.title: League of Legends
games.description: League of Legends is a team-based game with over 140 champions to make epic plays with. Play now for free.

games.title: Hearthstone
games.description: Hearthstone is a free-to-play collectible card game (CCG) developed by Blizzard Entertainment.

games.title: Skyrim
games.description: Skyrim reimagines and revolutionizes the open-world fantasy epic, bringing to life a complete virtual world open for you to explore any way you choose.

games.title: Need For Speed
games.description: Need for Speed (NFS) is a racing game franchise published by Electronic Arts and currently developed by Criterion Games, the developers of Burnout.

games.title: Minecraft
games.description: Minecraft is a 2011 sandbox game developed by Mojang Studios.

games.title: WoW - Classic
games.description: World of Warcraft (WoW) is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) released in 2004 by Blizzard Entertainment.

games.title: Diablo
games.description: Diablo is an action role-playing dungeon crawler video game series developed by Blizzard North and continued by Blizzard Entertainment

games.title: Fortnite
games.description: Fortnite is an online video game developed by Epic Games and released in 2017. It is available in three distinct game mode versions.

games.title: The Sims
games.description: The Sims is a series of life simulation video games developed by Maxis and published by Electronic Arts. The franchise has sold nearly 200 million copies worldwide.
